circumstances: On landing at Mys Kosistyy, near the Khatanga Bay, when had to go around due to strong cross winds. Engines # 3 and 4 flamed out shortly afterwards so the aircraft stalled and crashed in the tundra some 1,500 meters from the runway. While the aircraft was damaged beyond repair, all six occupants escaped unhurt.
probable_cause: It appears the flight engineer made a mistake by handling the fuel system, causing both right engines to stop while the captain was attempting a go around.
